scripts.frontend:build-main: npm run frontend:build-bs && node-sass --output-style compressed  --source-map true  assets/inilabs/frontend.scss assets/inilabs/frontend.min.css
scripts.frontend:watch-bs: node-sass -w  --output-style compressed --source-map true --include-path assets/inilabs/scss/ assets/inilabs/bootstrap.scss assets/inilabs/bootstrap.min.css
scripts.frontend:watch-main: node-sass -w  --output-style compressed --source-map true --include-path assets/inilabs/scss/ assets/inilabs/frontend.scss assets/inilabs/frontend.min.css
